Usury.definition: the lending of money at exorbitant interest rates ;specif
Usury.origin: [Medieval Latin usuria interest, lending at exorbitant interest, alteration of Latin usura use, interest (i.e., sum paid for use of money), from usus use]

1.definition: the lending of money at exorbitant interest ratesthe crime of charging or contracting to charge an unlawfully high rate of interest

2.definition: a rate or amount of interest charged in usury compareat
